title: Thunderbolts*
longDescription: Ensnared in a death trap, an unconventional team of antiheroes -- Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker -- embarks on a dangerous mission that forces them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts.
shortDescription: A team of antiheroes embarks on a dangerous mission that forces them to confront their dark pasts.

title: Mission: Impossible -- The Final Reckoning
longDescription: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue artificial intelligence that can destroy mankind.
shortDescription: Ethan Hunt and the team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue AI that can destroy mankind.

title: The Phoenician Scheme
longDescription: Wealthy businessman Zsa-zsa Korda appoints his only daughter, a nun, as sole heir to his estate. As Korda embarks on a new enterprise, they soon become the target of scheming tycoons, foreign terrorists and determined assassins.
shortDescription: A businessman and his daughter become the target of scheming tycoons, terrorists and assassins.

title: Lilo & Stitch
longDescription: A fugitive alien helps a lonely Hawaiian girl mend her broken family.
shortDescription: A fugitive alien helps a lonely Hawaiian girl mend her broken family.

title: Ballerina
longDescription: Trained in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma, Eve Macarro takes on an army of killers as she seeks revenge against those responsible for the death of her father.
shortDescription: An assassin takes on an army of killers as she seeks revenge for her father's death.

title: Friendship
longDescription: Suburban dad Craig falls hard for his charismatic new neighbor, but his attempts to make an adult male friend soon threatens to ruin both of their lives.
shortDescription: A man's attempt to befriend his charismatic new neighbor threatens to ruin both of their lives.

title: Bring Her Back
longDescription: A brother and sister witness a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother.
shortDescription: A brother and sister witness a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother.

title: The Life of Chuck
longDescription: Charles "Chuck" Krantz experiences the wonder of love, the heartbreak of loss, and the multitudes contained in all of us.
shortDescription: Charles "Chuck" Krantz experiences love, loss, and the multitudes contained in all of us.

title: Dangerous Animals
longDescription: A shark-obsessed serial killer holds Zephyr, a rebellious surfer, captive on his boat. Racing against time, she must figure out a way to escape before he carries out a ritualistic feeding to the sharks below.
shortDescription: A captive surfer must escape the clutches of a serial killer before he feeds her to the sharks.

title: Sinners
longDescription: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their Mississippi hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.
shortDescription: Twin brothers return to their hometown only to discover a great evil is waiting to welcome them.

title: Mission: Impossible -- The Final Reckoning: The IMAX 2D Experience
longDescription: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue artificial intelligence that can destroy mankind.
shortDescription: Ethan Hunt and the team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue AI that can destroy mankind.

title: Dan Da Dan: Evil Eye
longDescription: Momo and Okarun travel to a hot springs town, staying at a house rented by Momo's old friend Jiji. They aim to solve a mystery about Jiji's family.
shortDescription: Momo and Okarun visit a hot springs town to solve a mystery about Jiji's family at the rented house.

title: Karate Kid: Legends
longDescription: After moving to New York City with his mother, kung fu prodigy Li Fong struggles to let go of the past as he tries to fit in with his new classmates. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone aren't enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.
shortDescription: A kung fu prodigy merges two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

title: I Don't Understand You
longDescription: Dom and Cole set out on the perfect Italian getaway. But after getting lost on the way to dinner, they end up stranded in a storm, offend the locals, and-whoops-accidentally kill a beloved restaurant owner. With no cell service or language skills, the body count continues to rise as their romantic escape goes completely off the rails.
shortDescription: Dom and Cole set out on the perfect Italian getaway. They accidentally kill a restaurant owner.

title: Final Destination Bloodlines
longDescription: Plagued by a violent and recurring nightmare, a college student heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.
shortDescription: A young woman heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death.

title: A Minecraft Movie
longDescription: A mysterious portal pulls four misfits into the Overworld, a bizarre, cubic wonderland that thrives on imagination. To get back home, they'll have to master the terrain while embarking on a magical quest with an unexpected crafter named Steve.
shortDescription: A portal pulls four misfits into the Overworld, a bizarre wonderland that thrives on imagination.

title: Pavements
longDescription: Documentary about the American indie band Pavement, which combines scripts with documentary images of the band and a musical mise-en-scene composed of songs from their discography.
shortDescription: A musical mise-en-scene composed of songs from their discography.

title: Bay of Angels
longDescription: This luminous, hypnotic tale of love at the roulette wheel has not been seen theatrically in the U.S. since its original 1964 release. In this lighthearted precursor to "Croupier," Jeanne Moreau stars as Jackie, a compulsive gambler who falls in love with a bank clerk (Claude Mann) on holiday in Nice. At first, the two lovers simply use each other as good luck charms; but what happens to love when luck runs out? Painstakingly and lovingly restored by Agnès Varda.
shortDescription: Frenchwoman (Jeanne Moreau) gambles in Nice, meets man (Claude Mann) on lucky streak.

title: Ran
longDescription: At the age of seventy, after years of consolidating his empire, the Great Lord Hidetora Ichimonji (Tatsuya Nakadai) decides to abdicate and divide his domain amongst his three sons. Taro (Akira Terao), the eldest, will rule. Jiro (Jinpachi Nezu), his second son, and Saburo (Daisuke Ryu) will take command of the Second and Third Castles but are expected to obey and support their elder brother. Saburo defies the pledge of obedience and is banished.
shortDescription: Lord Hidetora (Tatsuya Nakadai) and his sons wreak epic feudal chaos.

title: Streets of Fire
longDescription: Raven Shaddock (Willem Dafoe), along with his gang of merciless biker friends, kidnaps rock singer Ellen Aim (Diane Lane). Ellen's former lover, soldier-for-hire Tom Cody (Michael Paré), happens to be passing through town on a visit. In an attempt to save his star act, Ellen's manager, Billy Fish (Rick Moranis), hires Tom to rescue Ellen. Billy and Tom, along with former soldier McCoy (Amy Madigan), battle through dangerous cityscapes, determined to get Ellen back.
shortDescription: A hero (Michael Paré) rescues a rock star (Diane Lane) from a gang in a strange city.

title: The Ritual
longDescription: Two priests must put aside their differences to perform a series of dangerous exorcisms on a possessed young woman.
shortDescription: Two priests perform a series of dangerous exorcisms on a possessed young woman.
